document_data.mainbody:
Gwaelon was an elven house of Myth Drannor.
In the , the heir of House Gwaelon alongside half a dozen eleven house heirs, attempted to assassinate young Elminster Aumar and Symrustar Auglamyr, a Chosen of Mystra. The two escaped leaving behind a statuette charged with magic. When one of the young elven lords and warriors stuck the statuettes, a fearsome explosion occurred near the Narnpool. The Gwaelon heir was killed in the explosion.
